biotools.summary: DEep learning for identifying Cis-Regulatory ElementS is an extension of the Deep Learning Tutorials developped by LISA lab (www.deeplearning.net/tutorial/). Although it is developped for the identification of CREs, it can also be used for other applications.

bioschemas.name: DECRES
